name: Red miner MarsX
description:
The game here does not have Ads :), I was just too lazy to remove the buttons.

If you like the game please leave a nice review in the google play store version, that would really help me a lot :), link below

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.caracolgames.marsxx

Get immersed in this incredible digging adventure, get ever so more valuable minerals, upgrade your machine and be prepared for the unexpected. Dealing with natural and artificial obstacles. Local animals may interfere in your job. Or unexpected bombs but be prepared with items from the store. Eventually, you will find the real secret of Mars. The greatest creature of them all.

The game includes:

11 different minerals

8 special treasures

2 types of enemies

1 final boss

A very big map

Auto-save feature

16 achievements

Adjustable controls

Support for mouse and keyboard

Support for Bluetooth joystick

landscape and portrait mode supported

lots of hours of fun.
